message.body: Gooood morning! Looks like there's a 2 hour delay... I guess this means we should push things back 2 hours? But probably also leave extra travel time. I'm going to email our contact and see if I hear anything back..
Good morning! Okay, sounds good. Hopefully they won't mind us going if they have shortened class periods.
Yeah, exactly. I'll keep you updated
Okay, 9:30 arrival it is! I'm thinking with all this "weather" we should probably give ourselves more extra time...want to head out from ga/petworth at 745?
Actually...let's just leave at 8. The schedule is so messed up at this point that 15 mins won't make a difference
Just came out of the metro, where should i look for you? (On ga ave south bound)
